content: a court in rimini has issued a final ruling after a 7year legal process regarding the division of a property consisting of an apartment and a storeroom the court has determined the shares due to each coheir with mr pm receiving €7604334 mrs dp receiving €19560 and mr p receiving €7637633 the court has also ordered the payment of these amounts to the coheirs the legal proceedings began when mr pm sued mr dm for the dissolution of the inheritance community and the sale of the property the court found the property to be divisible and ordered its sale the court has also addressed objections raised by mrs dp including the admissibility of the claim and the request for a stay of judgment the court has determined the final shares due to each coheir and ordered the payment of these amounts additionally mrs dp has been ordered to pay the litigation costs general expenses vat and reimburse mr p for the courtappointed experts report the ruling was made on december 6 2019 by the judge in rimini
